extendedInfo.description: This is the license for BubbleUPnP, removing the ads and limitations of the free version. Please install and evaluate the BubbleUPnP app first as this is just the license. To hide this license app icon from the launcher, start this license app and click "hide launcher icon".BubbleUPnP is a full featured UPnP/DLNA Control Point,  UPnP Media Renderer and UPnP Media Server. Play easily your music, videos and images on your phone and devices on your network (DLNA TVs, XBMC, WMP, ...), from your external UPnP Media Servers. Play your phone/tablet and cloud media to those devices.Browse and play your local phone/tablet media from other devices (PS3, ...). BubbleUPnP can also be used as a standalone music player, even without any network connection.Optional Internet Streaming:More than just regular LAN streaming, BubbleUPnP offer the unique feature to stream efficiently your media via the Internet over a mobile or WiFi connection. Internet streaming requires installing server software "BubbleUPnP Server" running on Windows, MacOS X, Linux or a NAS (it is not required for regular LAN streaming, see NOTE below). To learn more about BubbleUPnP Server and Internet streaming visit http://www.bubblesoftapps.com/bubbleupnpserverNOTE: YOU DO NOT NEED TO INSTALL BUBBLEUPNP SERVER FOR REGULAR UPNP/DLNA LAN STREAMING.Please submit any feedback and issues on http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1118891. For issues you can contact me directly as there is no way I can contact you with Market comments.Features:- Tablet, ICS, GoogleTV support, landscape mode- stream music and videos from your UPnP/DLNA Media Server (Twonky, Asset UPnP, any NAS with UPnP, ...) to your Android device.- stream media from Google Music, Google Drive, Dropbox- Codecs supported for audio local playback: with system decoders: MP3, AAC (without DRM), WMA, Ogg Vorbis. With app's own decoders: WAV, FLAC, ALAC, LPCM. Samplerates > 48Khz and 24 bits supported for FLAC, WAV. - Video playback is delegated to an external app (VPlayer, MoboPlayer, DICE Player,...)- stream music/videos from your UPnP/DLNA Media Server to your UPnP renderers with regular playback controls (play, pause, seek, volume, ...). - UPnP Media Server: play your local phone/tablet media to other devices or to your Android device (standalone media player). Browse and play your local phone/tablet media from other devices (PS3, WMP, ...). Able to browse the SD Card. Google Music and Dropbox streaming supported- UPnP renderer: control media playback of your android device from another UPnP Control point- Internet streaming/downloading over a mobile or WiFi connection with BubbleUPnP Server- UPnP tethering with BubbleUPnP Server (makes Media Servers from a LAN visible on another LAN)- Download tracks, full albums and videos from your Media Server to your android device (with covers if available), to make them available in your favorite Android music and media player- can play additional media to renderer through 3rd party apps: shoutcast radio (XiiaLive), youtube, dailymotion,... (semperVidLinks)- Gallery-like image viewer- Mute / Repeat / Shuffle- Editable playlist to queue tracks for playback- Fully editable saved playlists- Shuffle Playlist- Shuffle Library (shuffle tracks from your entire Media Server)- Scrobbling support- Sleep Timer- Display album art- Display artist info from Last.fm (requires Last.fm app)- Powerful UPnP Search. Search for tracks, albums, artists and videos (exact support depends on Media Server)- Bookmarks. Access quickly albums and folders- Random track list generation. Discover forgotten gems in your Library- Multiple selection. swipe many items to apply a common operation

reviews.title: Great for xbox 360 streaming
reviews.comment: Streaming from my qnap to my xbox360 works as expected, great app, easy to use, no crashing, worth every one of the 5 stars.
reviews.author: tony baum

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: Great app but too many bugs. This is fine as a development project to try for free but i paid money for it and can not use it because it has so many problems.
reviews.author: Serge Luke

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: I use this app pretty much every day to stream tunes from my PC. I really wish there were buttons on the lock screen though, like with the default music player (on ICS). Hopefully in a future release...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I paid for the license because of the extra features and this app is just fantastic. Works great for streaming almost anything to my Samsung smart tv with one click. One of my smartest buys
reviews.author: Jesse Peterson

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: I tried other similar apps and this is the one that I found to be the more reliable, stable and faster.    Great support from the developer as well!
reviews.author: C\303\251sar Dur\303\241n

reviews.title: Excellent, works perfectly
reviews.comment: I use this with a Samsung SmartTV and a router with a hard drive connected to it that serves as my DLNA server. This works perfectly every time. I just browse through my media, create a playlist and just sit back and enjoy. It\'s real easy to manipulate the playlist, reorder, remove, etc. Seek works. It\'s phenomenal.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good for music, needs work for video
reviews.comment: Can\'t control video if rendered on another device (e.g. Windows Media Player). Does not work with subtitles.
reviews.author: Nicolage Winters

reviews.title: Best streaming app by far
reviews.comment: Having tried many other dlna/upnp streaming apps, I can say that this is easily the best and most powerful one out there.  It\'s simple and easy to use.  I use it to play music to my onkyo system.   I just wish it looked a bit slicker.
reviews.author: chris r

reviews.title: Sony TV won\'t detect as media renderer only with bubble upnp
reviews.comment: I have Samsung note ii and  lg nexus 4 Lg nexus 4 has bubble upnp renderer it has lot of problems in detecting Sony kdl-42w800a But note ii has default Samsung video player it won\'t have a problem in detecting TV as renderer With bubble upnp note ii won\'t detect Sony tv Please rectify the above problem as quick as possible to get your stars back
reviews.author: Arumuga Nainar Murugan

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Absolutely far and above the best app I\'ve installed - continues to amaze me with its capabilities, google music streaming via dlna to my stereo, even my xbox whilst playing a game, its brilliant
reviews.author: Charlie Sutton

reviews.title: Great app for my LAN
reviews.comment: Thank\'s very much! No problem using this beautiful app. I\'m using it to stream my videos from my hdd atached to my android media player, thru my LAN Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Andrei C

reviews.title: Great stuff, works perfectly
reviews.comment: Really useful. I use it to send music from my laptop to my tablet which is plugged in to my hifi. Now I can play whatever music I want in WMP, and it plays without wires over my stereo system, AND sounds beautiful!!! Effortless to set up too
reviews.author: Greg Larson

reviews.title: Flac Transcoding Please!
reviews.comment: Awesome otherwise! Worth every penny. I can control my Samsung TV volume via DLNA and play Google Music on the fly. Awesome!
reviews.author: Chris V

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Plays just about anything without problems
reviews.author: Eren Ustusoy

reviews.title: Simply brilliant
reviews.comment: I was looking for an app that can stream my Google Music library for ages. And this app does it incredibly well!!! Did not hesitate one bit before purchasing it and so far I have been VERY satisfied. Keep up the good work guys!!! And THANKS A LOT!!!
reviews.author: Lyuben Hranov

reviews.title: Works after a Bit of Tinkering with my Nexus Q
reviews.comment: I bought this so I could still use my nexus Q with Google music. After contacting the developer, they said that i had to install the play store because it has a licensing check. After I installed the playstore and did a bit of tinkering, I got it to work! Awesome!  Thank you for bringing my Nexus Q back to life!
reviews.author: Vincente Ciancio

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: Finally found upnp app that will play full albums from my renderer rather than selecting individual tracks. One happy bunny :)
reviews.author: Neil Long

reviews.title: Pop up ads suck
reviews.comment: Pops up ads while streaming videos. I want a refund.
reviews.author: Robb Holmstrom

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Allows me to stream music from my Google Music cloud to my home Sonos speakers . A must have of Sonos/Google users.
reviews.author: Pete Banham

reviews.comment: Well worth it.
reviews.author: Deepak Kapoor
